traits.name: Sum of Our Parts
traits.description: You gain +1 [P] item slot. Once each encounter, when you use a [P] item, you may use that item again immediately.

traits.name: Winged Embrace
traits.description: Once each encounter, when an ally would suffer [DMG] from any source, the Ardorok suffers this [DMG] reduced by 3, instead.

traits.name: Firebird's Rally
traits.description: Once each encounter, during your turn, you may have your ardorok perform: [Heal] | [Range] 1-3 [RCV] 3| [DEF] 1 |

traits.name: Positive Affirmation
traits.description: If you or your ardorok targets a unit with a [Heal] that is at maximum [HP], and that unit doesn't have a [DEF] token, that unit gains one [DEF] token.

traits.name: Soothing Shower
traits.description: At the end of each of your turns, you may have your ardorok suffer [DMG]1 to have all allies within [Range] 1 of your Radiant Ardorok recover [RCV] 1.

traits.name: Scalding Shower
traits.description: At the end of each of your turns, you may have your ardorok suffer [DMG]1 to have all enemies within [Range] 1 of your Radiant Ardorok suffer [DMG]1.

traits.name: Aeroelastic
traits.description: Once each encounter, at the end of your turn, you may remove your standee from the map. At the begining of the next round, place your standee into any empty space on the map.

traits.name: Electrostatic
traits.description: When you end your turn occupying a space with a [windscreen], you may flip any one of your ether dice in your personal pool to its [Wind] side.

traits.name: Tropistic
traits.description: You gain +1 [Head] item slot. Each time you spend one or more infused ether to use the effect on a [Head] item, recover [RCV] 1.

traits.name: Atmospheric Conditioning
traits.description: At the begining of each encounter, you may create two [DMG]3 traps in empty spaces anywhere on the map. These traps must be 4 or more spaces away from each other.

traits.name: Eye of the Storm
traits.description: You gain the [Flying] trait.

traits.name: Shockwave Propagation
traits.description: When you or an ally trigger [windscreen], increase the amount of damage that is reduced by +1.

traits.name: Lost Hope
traits.description: Units that occupy your [Frozen Soul] reduce their [DEF] by 1, to a minimum of 0.

traits.name: Sap Will
traits.description: When a unit attacks while occupying your [Frozen Soul], you may remove that [Frozen Soul] to have that attack gain -2 [DMG].

traits.name: Gripping Despair
traits.description: When an enemy ends their turn within [Range] 0-1 of 2 or more [Frozen Soul], that unit suffers [DMG]1.

traits.name: Meltwater Spring
traits.description: As an ability, you may remove one [Ice Spikes] or [Frozen Soul] within [Range] 0-1 to generate [Water].

traits.name: Hunter's Instinct
traits.description: After you resolve an attack action, you may perform [Dash] 1.

traits.name: Hungering Cold
traits.description: After each time you complete a movement action, you may move an [Ice Spikes] or [Frozen Soul] up to two spaces.

traits.name: Carry The One
traits.description: After each time you perform a movement or teleport action, one of your glyphs may perform [Dash] 1.

traits.name: Substitution
traits.description: Once per encounter, before you are attacked, [Teleport] to one of your glyphs.

traits.name: Wild Card
traits.description: Once per encounter, you may flip your reaction token over to its ready side.

traits.name: Partial Derivative
traits.description: Your hand size is increased by 1.

traits.name: Polynomial Expression
traits.description: Your Luminescent Hyperbola can enter into spaces with one or more Luminescent Hyperbola.

traits.name: Undefined Variable
traits.description: Once per encounter, you may flip your reaction token over to its ready side.

traits.name: Full Complement
traits.description: Once each encounter, perform all of the actions on one ability. (You must perform those actions in the order as described in your special rules.)

traits.name: Nothing Wasted
traits.description: You gain +1 [1 Hand] item slot. ||| At the end of each of your turns, if you spent two or more infused ether dice to activate the effects of your hand items, infuse [+|wild] from the general pool.

traits.name: Fire Sale
traits.description: When you [Push] or [Pull] an enemy into [wildfire], trigger its effects immedaitely.

traits.name: Shrewd Negotiator
traits.description: At the end of your turn, you may activate an aditional ability.

traits.name: Bear Arms
traits.description: You gain +3 [Hand] item slot. At the end of each of your turns, you may infuse one [+|ether] from the general pool.

traits.name: Fine Print
traits.description: Once per encounter, perform all of the actions on one skill card. (You must perform those actions in the order as described in your special rules.)

traits.name: Explosive Emissions
traits.description: After each time you play a rave skill card, one adjacent enemy suffers [DMG]1.

traits.name: Theran Instinct
traits.description: After each time you play a rally skill card, perform [Dash] 2.

traits.name: Metabolic Balancing
traits.description: After each time you play a reaction card, your recover [RCV] 1.

traits.name: Silvan Appendages
traits.description: Gain +1 [Target] on all of your [m_attack] abilities.

traits.name: Entoman Carapace
traits.description: Gain +1 [DEF]. ||| Reduce your max [HP] by 3.

traits.name: Wing Membranes
traits.description: Gain the [Flying] trait. || You can not take this trait if you already have the [Flying] trait.

traits.name: Hyper Flexibility
traits.description: When you cause impact damage or falling, add +1 to the result. ||| When you suffer impact damage, add +1 to the result.

traits.name: Catabolic Boosting
traits.description: You gain a second reaction token. Use this trait as that reaction token. When you use this trait, suffer [DMG]2.
